alert.note: Alert for Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 5:28PM MDT until June 05 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Latah County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 515 PM PDT. * At 427 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moscow, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Deary, Harvard, Helmer and Joel. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 334 and 335, and between mile markers 339 and 341. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
